data.prayer: Over 74.46 percent of the people of Batha are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Batha, Chad
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 28,511 believers in Batha against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary: On average, 50 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Batha, Chad.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give your people in Batha, Chad a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Batha, Chad so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kuka people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kuka people.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Batha, Chad to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Batha, Chad to the gospel today.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Batha.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Batha
location.people_groups_list: Dangaleat, Bernde, Mubi, Daju, Dar Daju, Daza
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dangaleat (115,000), Bernde (9,700), Mubi (108,000), Daju, Dar Daju (65,000), Daza (492,000)
